comments.comment: Not sure if it was a bug on our end or in baseweb but it's fixed by the latest version of baseweb. However I had to upgrade to node >= 10 and the base theme on baseweb v9 is different and will require some massaging. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tvst>@tvst</denchmark-link> thoughts?
Still broken even after upgrading to latest baseweb. However it works on the baseweb site, so seems to be something on our end. Our custom theme perhaps?
Looks like this was fixed somewhere between 0.72 and 0.73, potentially from the baseweb upgrade. Closing.
